t: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

a: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
t: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

a: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
t: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
